title: Gichere Gakungu
text: Gichere Gakungu (born 1 January 1942) is a Kenyan <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201964%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>.
